name: Arcanists 2: Mobile
description:
Arcanists, the popular FunOrb game has been accurately re-created thanks to developer pur3 extreme. There are already new features, new spells and includes all old original gameplay aspects with much more to come. It has been re-coded from the ground up using Unity as the game engine! Playable on Windows, Mac, Linux and Android!!

Websites: https://arcanists.online http://arcanists2.com 

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/PNnYxsc

Windows/Mac/Linux/Android Client: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1FUi9IcaE8Ny2rF-wVJJiw417JoFYRwyD

Old wiki for information on the game!: https://funorb.fandom.com/wiki/Arcanists
